page.title: 01ALL ABOUT TONYREFAIL
page.content: Tonyrefail is a small town in the Ely Valley, Mid Glamargan. The Cardiff to Rhondda road (A4119) passes through the town.There are not many shops in Tonyrefail but in these shops you can buy almost anything-food,televisions, sweets,tools,toys,clothes,newspapers, furniture,cars and caravans.There are also some garages and factories in the area. About 9500 people live in Tonyrefail and Coedely.There are 3070 houses in Tonyrefail.Of these houses about 1850 are Council owned.Most of the houses were built as homes for the 2000 men who used to work in the Coedely colliery and coke ovens. My house is a semi detached in Celyn Isaf.Down stairs it has a kitchen, dining room,lounge and hall.Up stairs it has a toilet,bathroom and 3 bedrooms.The house is heated by gas.
